collection:
## Privacy Policy

### Website Visitors

Like most website operators, DrawGPT collects non-personally-identifying
information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make
available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and
the date and time of each visitor request.

DrawGPT’s purpose in collecting
non-personally identifying information is to better understand how DrawGPT’s
visitors use its website.

DrawGPT also collects
potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP)
addresses.

### Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to DrawGPT’s websites choose to interact with DrawGPT in ways
that require DrawGPT to gather personally-identifying information.

The amount
and type of information that DrawGPT gathers depends on the nature of the
interaction.

For example, we ask visitors who use our design application to
provide a username and email address.

In each case, DrawGPT collects such
information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose
of the visitor’s interaction with DrawGPT.

### Aggregated Statistics

DrawGPT may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its websites.

DrawGPT uses cookies to help DrawGPT identify and track
visitors, their usage of DrawGPT website, and their website access
preferences.
sharing:
From time to time, DrawGPT may release non-
personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a
report on trends in the usage of its website.

DrawGPT does not use such information to identify its visitors,
however, and does not disclose such information, other than under the same
circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information,
as described below.

DrawGPT does not disclose
personally-identifying information other than as described below.

For instance, DrawGPT may reveal how many visitors a particular version of the
design application got, or say which features are most popular.

However,
DrawGPT does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as
described below.

### Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

DrawGPT discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-
identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors, and
affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to
process it on DrawGPT’s behalf or to provide services available at DrawGPT’s
websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others.

Some of
those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located
outside of your home country; by using DrawGPT’s websites, you consent to the
transfer of such information to them.

DrawGPT will not rent or sell
potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to
anyone.

Other than to its employees, contractors, and affiliated
organizations, as described above, DrawGPT discloses potentially personally-
identifying and personally-identifying information only when required to do so
by law, or when DrawGPT believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably
necessary to protect the property or rights of DrawGPT, third parties, or the
public at large.
